name: Saasu.com
overview:
Easy online accounting for small and medium businesses.

Ideal for franchises and franchise network operators.

Software-as-a-service.

Multi-user. Multi-currency. Multi-business.

Tax support for 50 countries.

Invoicing, inventory, general ledger, API, contacts/customer relationship management, suppliers, staff, payroll/salaries, email enabled communication, free transaction limited version available.

Design and share your own Crowd Themed CSS driven PDF/email stationery.

Tags.

Reports.

Hundreds of partners.

Partner ecosystem of addon products for point of sale, business intelligence, ecommerce, integration with salesforce.com and more.
